resources.string: %1$s requires one or more Google Play services that are not currently available. Please contact the developer for assistance.
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet."
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
Accessing accounts from a restricted profile is not supported.
Error signing in the specified account. Please choose a different account.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. If the problem persists, please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s relies on Google Play services, which is not supported by your device. Contact the manufacturer for assistance.
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
last seen a long time ago

Please allow Telegram to receive SMS so that we can automatically enter your code for you.

"Are you sure you want to log out?
Note that you can seamlessly use Telegram on all your devices at once.
Remember, logging out kills all your Secret Chats."
Are you sure you want to cancel registration?
Are you sure you want to start a secret chat?
Are you sure you want to terminate all other sessions?
Are you sure you want to share your phone number?
The bot will know your phone number. This can be useful for integration with other services.
Are you sure you want to share your phone number %1$s with %2$s?
Are you sure you want to unblock this contact?

Please note that Telegram Support is done by volunteers. We try to respond as quickly as possible, but it may take a while.

Please take a look at the Telegram FAQ: it has answers to most questions and important tips for troubleshooting.
Require passcode if away for a time.
You will now see a lock icon on the chats page. Tap it to lock your Telegram app with your new passcode.

"When you set up an additional passcode, a lock icon will appear on the chats page. Tap it to lock and unlock your Telegram app.
Note: if you forget the passcode, you'll need to delete and reinstall the app. All secret chats will be lost."
We will send an SMS with a confirmation code to your new number.
The number %1$s is already connected to a Telegram account. Please delete that account before migrating to the new number.
Sorry, you have created too many public links. Try deleting or making some of your groups or channels private.
Are you sure you want to make %1$s an administrator?
un1 added you to this channel
"This user hasn't joined the channel yet. Do you want to invite them?"
You can add administrators to help you manage your channel. Tap and hold to remove admins.
Channels are a new tool for broadcasting your messages to large audiences.
Unfortunately, you were banned from participating in public groups.
Sorry, this chat is no longer accessible.
Sorry, this chat is no longer accessible.
"Sorry, you can't send messages to this channel."
Wait! Deleting this channel will remove all members and all messages will be lost. Delete the channel anyway?
You will lose all messages in this channel.
"Do you want to join the channel '%1$s'?"
Are you sure you want to leave the channel?
Anyone who has Telegram installed will be able to join your channel by following this link.
Only channel administrators can see this list.
%1$s sent a voice message to the channel %2$s
%1$s shared a contact in the channel %2$s

%1$s sent a video to the channel %2$s
Members will not be notified when you post
Members will be notified when you post
Private channels can only be joined via an invite link.
People can join your channel by following this link. You can revoke the link any time.

"Please choose a link for your public channel, so that people can find it in search and share with others.
If you're not interested, we suggest creating a private channel instead."
Public channels can be found in search, anyone can join them.
Sorry, you have created too many public channels. You can either create a private channel or delete one of your existing channels first.
Add names of the admins to the messages they post.
"Sorry, you can only add the first 200 members to a channel. Note that an unlimited number of people may join via the channel's link."
"Sorry, you can't add this user to channels."
Sorry, too many admins in this channel.
Sorry, too many bots in this channel.
Sorry, this user decided to leave this channel, so you cannot invite them back here.
People can share this link with others and find your channel using Telegram search.

"Please note that if you choose a public link for your channel, anyone will be able to find it in search and join.
Do not create this link if you want your channel to stay private."
Open external links within the app
Logs out all devices except for this one.
If you enable comments, people will be able to discuss your posts in the channel.

"%1$s is using an older version of Telegram, so secret photos will be shown in compatibility mode.
Once %2$s updates Telegram, photos with timers for 1 minute or less will start working in 'Tap and hold to view' mode, and you will be notified whenever the other party takes a screenshot."
This action is irreversible. It is not possible to downgrade a supergroup to a regular group.

"Members limit reached. To go over the limit and get additional features, upgrade to a supergroup: • Supergroups can get up to %1$s • New members can see the full message history • Deleted messages will disappear for all members • Members can edit their own messages • Creator can set a public link for the group"
"In supergroups: • New members can see the full message history • Deleted messages will disappear for all members • Members can edit their own messages • Creator can set a public link for the group"
"Sorry, you can't create a group with these users because of their privacy settings."
"Important: you won't be able to see Last Seen times for people with whom you don't share your Last Seen time. Approximate last seen will be shown instead (recently, within a week, within a month)."
These users will or will not be able to add you to groups and channels regardless of the settings above.
These settings will override the values above.
If you do not log in at least once within this period, your account will be deleted along with all groups, messages and contacts.
You can provide an optional description for your channel.
You can provide an optional description for your group.
Show recent chats in share menu

"Please follow these steps to complete Two-Step Verification Setup:
1. Check your e-mail (don't forget the spam folder) %1$s
2. Click on the validation link."
"You have enabled Two-Step verification. You'll need the password you set up here to log in to your Telegram account."
Leave no trace on our servers
%s invited you to join a secret chat.
You have invited %s to join a secret chat.

"This image and text were derived from the encryption key for this secret chat with %1$s.

If they look the same on %2$s's device, end-to-end encryption is guaranteed.

Learn more at telegram.org"
Sorry, this feature is currently not available in your country.
Too many attempts, please try again later
Too many attempts, please try again in %1$s

Change who can add you to groups and channels.

"Sorry, you can't add this user to groups because of user's privacy settings."
This user does not have Telegram yet, send an invitation?
"Do you want to join the chat '%1$s'?"
Sorry, this group is already full.
Sorry, this chat does not seem to exist.

"Photos, videos and other files from cloud chats that you have not accessed during this period will be removed from this device to save disk space. All media will stay in the Telegram cloud and can be re-downloaded if you need it again."
Change who can see your Last Seen time.
Who can see your Last Seen time?
Sorry, this name is already taken.
Anyone who has Telegram installed will be able to join your group by following this link.
The name must not exceed 32 characters.
Channel names must have at least 5 characters.
Group names must have at least 5 characters.
"Channel names can't start with a number."
"Group names can't start with a number."

"Clearing the local database will delete the texts of cached messages and compress the database to save internal disk space. Telegram needs some data to work, so database size will not reach zero.
This operation can take a few minutes to complete."
You have enabled Two-Step Verification, so your account is protected with an additional password.

You can add administrators to help you manage your group. Tap and hold to remove them.
Wait! Deleting this group will remove all members and all messages will be lost. Delete the group anyway?
You will lose all messages in this group.
Are you sure you want to leave the group?
Private groups can only be joined if you were invited or have an invite link.
People can join your group by following this link. You can revoke the link any time.
Public groups can be found in search, chat history is available to everyone and anyone can join.
People can share this link with others and find your group using Telegram search.

"Please note that if you choose a public link for your group, anyone will be able to find it in search and join.
Do not create this link if you want your supergroup to stay private."
You set the self-destruct timer to %1$s
Please add files to the music library on your device to see them here.
"Blocked users are removed from the group and can only come back if invited by an admin. Invite links don't work for them."

Please send an email to sms@stel.com and tell us about your problem.
Share photos and videos in this chat and access them on any of your devices.
Photos and videos from this chat will be shown here.
You can log in to Telegram from other mobile, tablet and desktop devices, using the same phone number. All your data will be instantly synchronized.
"You don't have a video player, please install one to continue"
Share music in this chat and access them on any of your devices.
Music from this chat will be shown here.
Share files and documents in this chat and access them on any of your devices.
Files and documents from this chat will be shown here.
Share links in this chat and access them on any of your devices.
Shared links from this chat will be shown here.

Sorry, you can only add mutual contacts to groups at the moment.

"%1$s, We detected a login into your account from a new device on %2$s
Device: %3$s Location: %4$s
If this wasn't you, you can go to Settings - Privacy and Security - Sessions and terminate that session.
If you think that somebody logged in to your account against your will, you can enable two-step verification in Privacy and Security settings.
Sincerely, The Telegram Team"
Keep a low impact background connection to Telegram to receive notifications. Enable for reliable notifications.
Relaunch app when shut down by user or system. This will ensure app can show notifications.

Telegram delivers messages faster than
any other application.

Telegram is free forever. No ads.
No subscription fees.

Telegram keeps your messages safe
from hacker attacks.

Telegram has no limits on the size of
your media and chats.

Telegram lets you access your messages
from multiple devices.

Telegram messages are heavily encrypted
and can self-destruct.
Hint must be different from your password
Please create a hint for your password
Your recovery e-mail %1$s is not yet active and pending confirmation.
Telegram needs access to your contacts so that you can connect with your friends across all your devices.
Telegram needs access to your microphone so that you can send voice messages.
Telegram needs access to your location so that you can share it with your friends.
Telegram needs access to your location.
Telegram needs access to your storage so that you can send and save photos, videos, music and other media.
"All your Telegram contacts will get your new number added to their address book, provided they had your old number and you haven't blocked them in Telegram."

"You can change your Telegram number here. Your account and all your cloud data — messages, media, contacts, etc. will be moved to the new number. Important: all your Telegram contacts will get your new number added to their address book, provided they had your old number and you haven't blocked them in Telegram."

Tap and hold on user to delete.

Are you sure you want to report spam from this group?
You will lose all your chats and messages, along with any media and files you shared, if you proceed with resetting your account.

"This action can't be undone.
If you reset your account, all your messages and chats will be deleted."
Reset all notification settings to default

"We have sent a recovery code to the e-mail you provided:
%1$s"
Please check your e-mail and enter the 6-digit code we have sent here.
"If you can't restore access to your e-mail, your remaining options are either to remember your password or to reset your account."
"Since you haven't provided a recovery e-mail when setting up your password, your remaining options are either to remember your password or to reset your account."
Are you sure you want to revoke this link? Once the link is revoked, no one will be able to join using it.
The previous invite link is now inactive. A new link has been generated.
"Please note that inline bots are provided by third-party developers. For the bot to work, the symbols you type after the bot's username are sent to the respective developer."
Would you like to enable extended link previews in Secret Chats? Note that link previews are generated on Telegram servers.
"We've sent the code to the Telegram app on your other device."
"We've sent an activation call to your phone %1$s. Don't take it, Telegram will process everything automatically."
We are calling your phone %1$s to dictate a code.
"We've sent an SMS with an activation code to your phone %1$s."
Control your sessions on other devices.
You can set a password that will be required when you log in on a new device in addition to the code you get in the SMS.
All members can add new members, edit name and photo of the group.
Only admins can add and remove members, edit name and photo of the group.
This will send your current location to the bot.
This bot would like to know your location each time you send it a request. This can be used to provide location-specific results.
App was unable to determine your current location
We will send you an SMS in %1$d:%2$02d
You will be able to add more users after you finish creating the group and convert it to a supergroup.
Please confirm your country code and enter your phone number.

"Artists are welcome to add their own sticker packs using our @stickers bot.
Users can add stickers by tapping on them and choosing \"Add to Stickers\"."
Tap here to access saved GIFs
Tap on a session to terminate.

Undo all custom notification settings for all your contacts and groups
Do you want to unpin this message?

This user is already in this group
Sorry, you are not allowed to do this.

You can choose a username on Telegram. If you do, other people will be able to find you by this username and contact you without knowing your phone number.

You can use a–z, 0–9 and underscores. Minimum length is 5 characters.
Sorry, this username is already taken.
The username must not exceed 32 characters.
A username must have at least 5 characters.
"Sorry, a username can't start with a number."
Who can add me to group chats?
You can restrict who can add you to groups and channels with granular precision.
You were removed from this group
"Please check your e-mail (don't forget the spam folder) to complete Two-Step Verification setup."
Please add your valid e-mail. It is the only way to recover a forgotten password.

"No, seriously.
If you forget your password, you will lose access to your Telegram account. There will be no way to restore it."
Your password for Two-Step Verification is now active.
For accessing your hidden chats, you must long press on selected item and enter your passcode in search field.

After you enable this option, New media in favorite chats will be downloaded automatically.
Auto sync phone contacts with parsgram contacts. You must enable parsgram auto sync in account settings too.
Cache file with size %1$s cleaned successfully.
%1$s cache files with size %2$s deleted successfully.
"Add selected contacts to the channel? If you selected many contacts, Some of them will ignore by server. This limitation is server side."
Preview and Confirmation on Sticker Send
Show sticker preview and confirmation dialog before sending sticker.
Show confirmation dialog before sending voice messages.
Are you sure you want to delete and leave selected groups?
"Delete Multiple Messages activated. Now you must select two messages. Selected messages and all messages between them will be deleted."
Are you sure you want to delete selected private chats?
"Don't Close Current Chat by Joining New Chat"
When you click on a join link in a message, you will not lose your current chat.
Files count must not exceed 150 files. Please remove some of them or remove completed ones.
"Download list is empty. To add downloads to this list, tap empty space beside messages and select \"Add to Download List\"."
Drawing icon will be shown beside attach icon in chat screen.
Add favorite stickers tab to stickers layout. You can add or delete sticker to favorites by long pressing tab icon.
"Favorite Stickers Edit Mode Enabled. Now tap on sticker to add or delete it from favorites. Long press on favorite tab icon to exit from this mode."
You exited from Favorite Stickers edit mode.
When you forward without quoting, photo and video captions will removed.

"When this mode enabled, your status will be shown offline to contacts and unread messages that you will read remain unread to them. Notice that your status will change between offline and online when you send a message to a contact."
For enabling \"Ghost Mode\", go to new Settings page from menu button.
"Are you sure you want to disable hide chats feature? All hidden chats will be shown again."

"When hide chats activated, you can hide your chats by tab and hold on your chats.
Note: if you forget the passcode, you'll need to delete and reinstall the app. All hidden chats will be visible again."
Hide Your Typing State In Chats
Instead of numbers, files will be saved using name_shamsidate format.
Mark all dialogs of this tab as read?
Note: Ghost mode will be disabled.

"Tap on menu item to change it's visibility.
Long press on menu item and drag it down or up to change it's ordering."
You can forward multiple messages to multiple people from forward buttons on action bar, like share button on beside channel messages.
You are not a member of any bot

"No categories yet... Create category by pressing the new category button in the top right corner. With this feature you can categorize your channels and groups. For example, you can create \"News\" category and put all related channels in it."
You are not a member of any channel
"No Favorite Chat If you like any chat, tap and hold then choose \"Add to Favorites\"."
You are not a member of any group
"There isn't any specific contact. Add your specific contacts from top right button."

Please restart application for applying changes.
"If you return to group, you can't leave it after a while. Are you sure?"
Are you sure you want to leave from selected channels?
"Any contact that have your phone number will be shown with a different icon beside it's name."
Chats will be shown as list instead of grid.
Show category list at startup of the application. You must have one category at least.
Show category icon in main screen action bar, you can use it to change selected category. You must have one category at least.
Show chats that you are admin of them in creator tab.
"Show contact status indicator in main screen. Green: Online Light Gray: Last seen recently Dark Gray: Last seen within a week Black: Last seen a long time ago, blocked or deleted account"
Show Contact Status Indicator In Groups
Show contact status indicator in groups chat screen. Colors are like contact status in main screen.
When you scroll messages, current message date will be shown at the top of the chat screen.
Show Exact Members and Views Count
Show members and views count in chats precisely.
Show Ghost Icon In Action Bar
Show ghost icon in action bar for enabling/disabling it quickly.
Show ghost state icon in action bar.
Show GIFs in full screen mode.
Show Hidden Chats In Share List
Hidden chats will be visible in direct share and multi forward list.
Hidden chats notifications will be shown in notification bar (without message details).
Show Last Seen Icon In Action Bar
Show last seen icon in action bar for checking your last seen status.
Show Multi User Items In Menu
Show \"New User\" or \"Change User\" items in menu of main screen.
Show your phone contacts in a separate tab.
If stickers are bigger than usual in chats, enable this option.
Show Tabs for Every Type of Chats
Show tabs for every type of chats.

"When this service enabled, you will receive notifications also when parsgram is closed. This service will consume more battery. So enable it just when you want to notify about specific contacts as soon as possible.
When this service is not enabled, you will receive notifications just when parsgram is opened."
"This is a favorite sticker. Are you sure you want to remove this sticker from favorites?"
When tablet mode is enabled, new windows will open in small screens.

"Tap on tab to change it's visibility.
Long press on tab and drag it down or up to change it's ordering."
Turn off Wi-Fi In the End
Use Front Speaker on Proximity Sensor
When the voice is playing and you hold your phone up to your ear, front speaker will be used.

"For checking \"Ghost Mode\" and your last seen time, you will redirect to chat page of yourself. So you can see your last seen time under your name in upper side of the screen. It is what your contacts will seen for your status."

"Find people, channels and robots with parsgram Username Finder easily.

Enter username and if it's available (green color) tap on tick icon on action bar.

You can use a–z, 0–9 and underscores. Minimum length is 5 characters.

Attention: When users report unwanted messages from a Telegram account, we apply a limit: Reported accounts can only send messages to people who have their number saved as a contact. This means that if you randomly contact people you don't know and send them annoying messages, you may lose the ability to do so in the future."
You must select at least one.

"Hello, Dear Support Team,
There is some problem with my telegram account. Some friends report me as a spammer wrongly and i found an unfair limitation on my account. Please solve my problem.
My Phone Number: %1$s My Telegram ID: %2$s
I look forward to hearing from you very soon.
Best Regards."
"مخاطبینی که شماره تلفن شما را دارند با آیکون از دیگر مخاطبین متمایز شده اند. می توانید این امکان را در صفحه تنظیمات پارس گرام غیرفعال کنید."
برای اینکه پارس گرام از وضعیت آنلاین شدن مخاطبین شما باخبر شود باید وضعیت آخرین بازدید شما برای مخاطبتان و وضعیت آخرین بازدید مخاطبتان برای شما قابل نمایش باشد.
نمایش زمان به صورت گذشته برای مثال 2 ساعت قبل
وقتی شما در حال نوشتن هستید مخاطب متوجه نمی شود
در حالت روح کسی از وضعیت آنلاین بودن شما با خبر نمیشود
نمایش تاریخ ها به تقویم ایرانی
در صورتی که نمایش زمان گذشته فعال باشد این عملکرد غیر فعال است
منشی خودکار به جای شما پاسخ پیام های دریافتی رو میده
در حال حاظر قادر به پاسخ گویی نیستم
